   $$

   $$

   $$

   $$
   f(n) = 2\left(2f\left(\frac{n}{4}\right) + \frac{n}{2}\right) + n = 4f\left(\frac{n}{4}\right) + n + n = 4f\left(\frac{n}{4}\right) + 2n
   $$

   $$
   f(n) = 2^k f\left(\frac{n}{2^k}\right) + n \sum_{i=0}^{k-1} 2^i
   $$

   $$
   f(n) = 2^{\log_2 n} f(1) + n \sum_{i=0}^{\log_2 n - 1} 2^i = n \cdot 1 + n \cdot (2^{\log_2 n} - 1)
   $$

   $$
